thread.section_title: Park Hyatt New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Large rooms, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Large rooms, friendly staff - Review of Park Hyatt New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: trippyNYC
title: Large rooms, friendly staff
text:
All the staff here is so friendly I wonder if they're actually New Yorkers. Guestrooms are quite large, even all the spaces in the separate bathroom quarters. Fitness room is a good size and includes a rower. The park is so close too, to go for a quick run. Swimming pool is 19m long. Biggest complaint is you can hear everything from the hallway inside the guestroom. People talking and doors were opening and closing a lot during our stay for some reason. Highest floor in the hotel is 25 (spa, fitness).
Room Tip: Higher floors may have glimpse of Central Park See more room tips
